game.name: Papercut Art Gallery-Growth
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 종이 자르기 예술에서 영감을 받은 예술적 퍼즐 게임입니다. 갤러리 내 성장 테마의 예술 작품을 복원하기 위해 종이 조각을 조합해야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An artistic puzzle game inspired by the art of papercutting. You'll need to piece together fragments of paper art to restore the museum's growth-themed artworks.

reviewHighlights.text: Very good if you want to make images from paper. Not so good when you have a tiny as piece and you can't find where to stick it for the next 5-10 min....
Yes!!! So happy to see a second game in this series, which will hopefully see even more additions in the future! I'm about a third in to the game so f...
